exm.mng: to defy world opinion, to risk universal condemnation
exm.pyn: mào tiān xià zhī dà bù wěi

exm.mng: William A.P. Martin (1827-1916), American missionary who lived 62 years in China between 1850 and 1916, and helped found many Chinese colleges, first president of Peking University

exm.cur: 与全世界为敌，冒天下之大不韪
exm.trd: 與全世界為敵，冒天下之大不韙
exm.mng: to defy world opinion, to risk universal condemnation
exm.pyn: yǔ quán shì jiè wéi dí , mào tiān xià zhī dà bù wěi
